title: Russia admits Kherson 'tense' under shelling
description: In a rare admission of problems, Russia's infamous army chief in Ukraine, Sergei Surovikin, says residents in Kherson should leave. Also: Ethiopia army seizes three towns in Tigray, and is there a Kimchi crisis in south Korea?
itunes:subtitle: Ukrainian troops are hitting the city's infrastructure
itunes:summary: In a rare admission of problems, Russia's infamous army chief in Ukraine, Sergei Surovikin, says residents in Kherson should leave. Also: Ethiopia army seizes three towns in Tigray, and is there a Kimchi crisis in south Korea?
itunes:author: BBC World Service
